Trade/Device Name(s): BD ProbeTec Chlamydia trachomatis (CT) Qx Amplified DNA Assay
Specimen Type(s): Gynecological specimens collected in BD SurePath Preservative Fluid
Gynecological specimens collected in PreservCyt Solution
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD ProbeTec Chlamydia trachomatis Qx Amplified DNA Assay using Strand Displacement Amplification technology on the BD Viper LT System for qualitative detection of Chlamydia trachomatis DNA
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of Chlamydia trachomatis DNA in various clinician- and patient-collected swab and urine specimens and gynecological samples to aid in the diagnosis of chlamydial urogenital disease in symptomatic and asymptomatic individuals
